thread.section_title: Scientifics Online Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Scientifics Online | scientificsonline.com
thread.title: LLE

author: LLE
title: LLE
text:
The glasses are flimsy, but what can you expect for the price? I think they will work fine for the upcoming eclipse of the sun. I wanted to purchase them well in advance. I think they will work OK for either adults or children.
I was frustrated by the shipping charges. The glasses weigh very little. I don't think the actual shipping cost is anything like as high as what I had to pay.
